name: searchstation
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool radio_world_75_000_worldwide_fm_radio_stations.
Tool description: This is one of the largest collection of FM Radios API from around the world. Listen Updated 79,000+ Radio stations. All the Stations are Updating Daily & Weekly basis, New stations are Adding As soon as possible. At least 100+ Stations Are adding and 1000+ Stations are fixing to this API Weekly (This is minium ratio).
API description: Search Radio station by keywords.
- keyword = radio name, country name
- limit = item limitation per page ***default 10***
- page = page number to be displayed ***default 1***
- order = order by ASCENDING/DISASCENDING  *(use only ASC or DESC)* ***default ASC***

keyword.description: The search keyword which could be a radio station name or a country name.

order.description: The order in which to display the results. Use 'ASC' for ascending or 'DESC' for descending. Default is 'ASC'.

page.description: The page number of the results to display. Default is 1.

limit.description: The limit of items to display per page. Default is 10.
